267924.<color_yellow>ゆめみの箱を 入手しました！\n<br>\n迷宮内に:
You received a Dream Box!
Dream Boxes can be obtained by dispelling the darkness in exchange for your Heart Energy shown in the upper left corner of the screen.
However, if your party is wiped out, you'll lose any Dream Boxes you collected.

267925.<color_yellow>うつしよの箱を 入手しました！\n<br>\n心層の:
Received a World Box!
In the Heart Maze, you can get a World Box as a reward for defeating the boss.
In addition, the higher your Maze Level is, the easier it is to find Augite Belts with stronger effects!

268123.迷宮レベルが上がると\n迷宮の主が 少し手強くなるぞ。:
As Maze Level increases, the
Boss grows slightly stronger.

268124.謎の魂の 記憶を取り戻すカギを\n見つけられそうな 予感がする。:

recovering the soul's memory.

268125.迷宮の主の気配は すこしずつ\n確実に 強くなっている。:
The Maze Boss' presence
continues to grow stronger.

268126.とても 強そうな気配がする……\nしっかり準備をして 挑戦しよう。:
It seems very strong... Be sure to
adequately prepare yourself.
